definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: a chief city of Bashan [[אֶדְâֶרעִי]] Jos 19:37; [[אֶדְרֶָעִי]] Nu 21:33 = De 3:1, De 3:10; [[בְּעַשְׁתָּרׂת בְּאֶדְרֶָעִי]] De 1:4; [[בְּעַשְׁתָּרׂת וּבְאֶדְרֶָעִי]] Jos 12:4, Jos 13:12 cf. Jos 13:31; —on identity of all these cf. Di De 3:10; modern Der‘ât, 7 1/2 hours WNW. of Bosra; Euseb. )Adraa/ (Lag:Onom. 213, 86 2nd ed. 235) cf. Di Nu 21:33 Wetzst:Hauran 47, 77, 123 Bd:Pal 201.
